document_data.name: Firegrate
document_data.mainbody: A '''firegrate''' was a handy accessory for cooking on fires.
document_data.Description: Firegrates were simple [[iron]] racks that could be placed over a fire so that a [[pot]] or similar device could be used to cook food.
document_data.Availability:
* ''[[Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue (in-universe)|Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue]]'' offered small, portable grates for camping and hiking. They were 6-by-12 inches (15-by-30 centimeters), and had hinged legs that folded in for storage. It came with an iron prod for moving a hot cookpot about, and cost 3 [[gp]].
* Firegrates and similar fire-related tools and implements could be found at [[Ember Me More]], a dedicated shop in [[Ravens Bluff]].
